sentences.sentence: The value of India increase greatly between 2010 and 2011, then it decrease with steady steps by 2018; while America decrease slightly with steady steps between 2010 and 2018.

sentences.sentence: The value of India increase greatly between 2010 and 2011, then it decrease with steady steps by 2018; while America decrease slightly with steady steps between 2010 and 2018.
